scripts.generate-models: docker run --rm -v $(pwd):/app openapitools/openapi-generator-cli generate -i /app/src/contracts/contract.swagger.yaml -g typescript-nestjs -o /app/src --global-property models --additional-properties=modelPropertyNaming=original,enumPropertyNaming=UPPERCASE,enumNameSuffix="",supportsES6=true,withInterfaces=true,fileNaming=camelCase,sortParamsByRequiredFlag=true,sortModelPropertiesByRequiredFlag=true
scripts.generate-all: npm run generate-models  && npm run generate-index && npm run move-models
